title: Soggy Stepsisters
description: Ada and Rachel couldn't be more different. After becoming stepsisters, they just can't seem to stop arguing. While on vacation at the family cabin, Ada and Rachel find themselves in a precarious situation that forces them to set aside their differences, work together, and ultimately form a friendship.
highFrequencyWords: arguing, cabin, canoe, gust, life jackets, paddle, stepdad, stepsister, vacation
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
phonics: Alphabetical Order                : Place words in alphabetical order
grammar:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
